name: Paxton The Pigeon's Adventure In The City (MashUp Game Jam 2)
name_original: Paxton The Pigeon's Adventure In The City (MashUp Game Jam 2)
description:
Paxton The  Pigeon's  Adventure In The City  was made for the MashUp Game Jam 2).

Help Paxton The Pigeon explore the city. A classic, normal, run of the mill 2D platformer...or is it?

A & D or left & right arrow key to move.

W, up arrow, or Space to Jump.

All code, art, sounds, and music were made by coreylr197.

Font is "Chelsea Market Font" by Tart Workshop
